Responsibilities: 
To carry out the work as per drawing and specification. 
Successfully carried out the work with time and Quality. 
Successfully implementing company Quality Management Systems 
Carrying out Site Inspections of structural and architectural works to specification. 
`
To ensure that proper methodology and instructions are followed in various execution activities. 
To impart training related to various site activities and successfully co-ordinate the same. 
Helping out in Execution works which include formwork, shuttering and reinforcement. 
Prepare daily progress and submit to planning team. 
Maintaining complete records of work done at site 
Co-ordination with planning and billing team for successfully carry out the project. 
To plan the work to be done and organize things so that deadlines are met 
To watch and inspect the construction and assure that it is done in full accordance with the plans and 
specifications. 
Review and approve Shop Drawings of equipment to be installed to assure the equipment meets or 
exceeds the specifications (often done with the Project Engineer). 
Meet with the General Contractor to keep the project on time and on budget. 
Execution teams are the part of the site management team, and takes some of the responsibility for 
security, health and safety, and organizing and supervising materials and people 
Site Execution Key Skills: 
Hardworking, Innovative, Creative, Good Leadership Quality, Teamwork, and ability to achieve Targets
in stipulated period of time 
Using my technical and management skills, knowledge of construction methods & equipment, along 
with Principles of financial, planning and managing, ability to turn the design of other engineers into 
successful Projects with utmost care in Quality and Safety Aspects.
